import React, { useContext } from 'react' import "./Main.css" import {Data} from "../../context/Userdata" export default function Main() { const b = useContext(Data) const mainfunc=(e,i)=>{ e.stopPropagation(); b.setinputdisplay(true); b.setpointer(i); } return (
{mainfunc(e,0)}}>

{mainfunc(e,1)}} onInput={(e)=>{console.log((e.target.innerHTML))}} suppressContentEditableWarning={true}> Anshul Jain

{mainfunc(e,2)}} onInput={(e)=>{console.log((e.target.innerHTML))}} suppressContentEditableWarning={true}> Full stack Developer

{mainfunc(e,3)}} onInput={(e)=>{console.log((e.target.innerHTML))}} suppressContentEditableWarning={true}> Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Magni omnis doloremque corporis necessitatibus id, magnam temporibus voluptatem blanditiis. Nobis debitis possimus, quaerat sunt nemo accusamus exercitationem quis. Fuga, ullam? Aperiam?

{mainfunc(e,5)}}>
) }
